text: A sequel to watch with the wife Ha

Predictable? Yeah. Just like most rom coms. I did however, think the characters had quite entertaining personalities and the storyline pulled my heart strings making me feel quite lonely afterwards. I think this all makes up for the mediocre acting. Very enjoyable film
It's the kind of movie I want to watch during the Christmas season. While predictable, it's full of charm and meaning needed for the season.
